title: Doctor Who: The Best Way To Find A Holistic Practitioner
author: The Chalkboard Editorial Team
description: Bookmark this incredible directory to help you find an integrative doctor or holistic practitioner in your area.
cleaned_text: It's a challenge to find a good doctor - period. But add to the process the search criteria needed to find a doctor who is open to holistic or integrative practices and the challenge intensifies even more. A huge swath of our population is switching gears and looking for natural and integrative solutions for our health concerns. Our modern medical system is a complex one and knowing where to start is sometimes half the battle. This holistic practitioner resource guide by our friends at [Food Matters](http://foodmatters.tv/?_ga=1.31267071.191404018.1447453119) is really impressive. We hope it provides many of you with a great place to begin the hunt - and understand some of the language on the topic - from "orthomolcecular" to "mercury-free." Finding a good natural health care practitioner can often be like looking for a needle in a haystack. This Practitioner Directory helps you find a holistic healthcare practitioner, [integrative](http://thechalkboardmag.com/interview-with-co-founder-of-scripps-center-for-integrative-medicine) doctor, [chiropractor](http://thechalkboardmag.com/living-well-with-dr-christy-garner), holistic [dentist](http://thechalkboardmag.com/dirty-mouth-oil-pulling-is-more-important-than-you-think) or colon-hydrotherapist in your local area. Or if you are looking for doctors that take a holistic approach to treating mental health conditions this is where you will find them. Understandably we do not endorse any particular medical practitioners listed below however hope that this information can act as a good starting point for patients and family members. The American Association of Naturopathic Physicians This organization lists licensed naturopathic physicians in America. [CHECK OUT HERE](http://www.naturopathic.org) Global Orthomolecular Physician Directory This is an international online directory of orthomolecular medicine practitioners. [CHECK OUT HERE](http://www.orthomolecular.org) Find A Naturopath This online directory can be used to locate naturopathic practitioners in the United States of America or Canada. [CHECK OUT HERE](http://www.findanaturopath.com) Canadian Association of Naturopathic Doctors The Canadian Association of Naturopathic Doctors offer an online search engine for naturopathic physicians in Canada. [CHECK OUT HERE](http://www.cand.ca) The American Chiropractic Association The largest professional association in the world representing doctors of chiropractic. [CHECK OUT HERE](http://www.acatoday.org) International Academy of Oral Medicine and Toxicology This organisation supplies an online listing of dentists who are trained in mercury filling removal and detoxification. [CHECK OUT HERE](http://www.iaomt.org) Mercury Free Dentists This international online index can be used to find holistic and biological dentists who practice mercury-free techniques and specialise in amalgam removal. [CHECK OUT HERE](http://www.mercuryfreedentists.com) International Association of Colonic Hydrotherapists The International Association of Colonic Hydrotherapists provides an online search tool to help you find a colonic hydrotherapist in your local area.
